title: Google Pixel 3 XL shutting down randomly after latest update Android 11
content:
Hi, I'm using google pixel 3XL right now. Because it's quite hard to get this phone in my country, I just got it in less than a year ago (may 2020 - brand new not second phone) and planning to use it for at least the next 2 years. Once I got it, I bought several stuffs for the phone like the case and etc from google store overseas.

These are the chronology of my issues last night:

Last time my Pixel 3 XL also had a sudden turn off, but it went back on quite smoothly after turning the power on
Until last night, as I was browsing through my Spotify, the phone turned off and went black. I tried to booting up the phone, and successfully enter the landing screen, but after I entered the pin, it shutting down again.
After that I've tried to enter into safe mode and the problem on the point 1 is still occur
And then i tried to booting up the phone once more, with these following settings:
Airplane mode on
After entered the pin, i turn off the airplane mode, and turning on the mobile data only
Wait for a few minutes, and then turning on the wifi
Thankfully my phone is turned on until now

So based on my experience above, I tried to do a quick research and found that this issue probably because of the motherboard failure,

I really love this phone, can someone help for my issue here?
